name: Best Buddies
description:
A short, silly game about creating the fittest Buddy to survive the harshness of winter. Submitted to Xanderjam #6. The theme was Survival of the Fittest.

CONTROLS: Mouse

Music and sound effects from Pixabay, "Best Buddies" by Kinemesis Music and "Xmas Boy Child Pop" by JuliusH. Font is Bubblegum Sans (Open Font License).
